info.title: Dime.Scheduler Import
info.description: The Dime.Scheduler Import Connector allows you to feed the system with scheduling related entities such as resources, tasks, skills, etc.

post.description: Add or update an appointment.

useFixedPlanningQuantity.description: Flag to indicate whether to use a fixed planning quantity.

roundToUnitOfMeasure.description: Flag to indicate whether to round up the unit of measure.

sentFromBackOffice.description: Flag to indicate whether the record was sent from the back office.

post.summary: Add or update a job
post.description: Add or update a job.

siteFromPostcode.description: The job's site from post code.

enableManualSelection.description: The job's flag to enable manual selection.

availableInGantt.description: The job's flag to enable project planning.

allowDependencies.description: The job's flag to allow dependencies.

overRuleGanttPlanning.description: The job's flag to allow the Gantt chart to override the planning.

checkAppointments.description: The job's flag to check appointments.

type.description: The notification type. 0 for debug, 1 for information, 2 for warning, 3 for error, 4 for fatal..
